official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a levee along the Meramec River to prevent flood damage to the community of Pacific, Missouri.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct a levee along the Meramec River to prevent flood damage to the community of Pacific, Missouri.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to construct a levee along the Meramec River to prevent flood damage to the community of Pacific, Missouri.
